title: Tailscale
summary: A zero-config VPN that connects all your devices into a secure private network. Access your home server, NAS, or Raspberry Pi from anywhere.
content:
Tailscale makes networking simple. Install it on any device, sign in, and suddenly all your devices can talk to each other securely â€” no port forwarding, no firewall rules, no dynamic DNS. It uses WireGuard under the hood for blazing-fast encrypted connections.

The magic is in the simplicity. Want to SSH into your home server from a coffee shop? Just use its Tailscale IP. Want to access your Home Assistant dashboard remotely? It's already there. Tailscale creates a mesh VPN where every device connects directly to every other device, with no central server bottleneck.

The free tier is generous â€” up to 100 devices and 3 users. Features like MagicDNS give your devices memorable names, subnet routers let you access your entire home network, and exit nodes let you route all traffic through a specific device. It's the networking tool that makes everything else possible.
